description: Describes an authorizer. Requires permission to access the DescribeAuthorizer action.

parameters.name: authorizerName
parameters.description: The name of the authorizer to describe.

nested_items.name: tokenKeyName
nested_items.description: The key used to extract the token from the HTTP headers.

nested_items.name: tokenSigningPublicKeys
nested_items.description: The public keys used to validate the token signature returned by your custom authentication service.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The UNIX timestamp of when the authorizer was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The UNIX timestamp of when the authorizer was last updated.

nested_items.name: signingDisabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether IoT validates the token signature in an authorization request.

nested_items.name: enableCachingForHttp
nested_items.description: When true, the result from the authorizer's Lambda function is cached for the time specified in refreshAfterInSeconds. The cached result is used while the device reuses the same HTTP connection.
